What is this?

A general place to share suggestions and concerns about the forums themselves

Tagging

I have locked down a subset of tags available only for this category, when posting please use them, so the admin team can organize this stuff more easily.

the tags you can use are: * issue * mobile * desktop * suggestion

When raising an issue please tag the issue as mobile or desktop and provide a screenshot

If you don't have an account someplace where you can easily put pictures I recommend Droplr
